mema aithihasika siddhiyen mema prakashanaye adangu waganthi pracharayata path karana men da “ee ee ratawala pawathina deshapalana thaththwaya pilibandawa wenasak nokara mema prakashanaya pradhana washayen pasal ha adhyapana aayathanayan mangin pathira wimata, pradarshanaya wimata, patanaya karawimata ha pahadili karawimata salaswana menda” eksath jathinge maha mandalaya wisin siyaluma samajika rajyayan gen illa sitina laddeya.

mema mahangi chaithya nirmanaya sandaha waya wu barapana pilibanda wisthara pawasimata aananda subasinha mahatha uthsuka nowe. emenma mema chaithya rajayanan wahanse shasanayata puja kirime uthsawa awasthawa da bahira aatopa walin thorawa itha cham eheth budu bathiyen sith sathan aalolanaya kerena sadaha saraniya ulelak wiya.

rajapaksha parapure thewana niyojanaya arambaenne chamal rajapakshayangeni.chamal rajapaksha tharunaya wruththiya lesa polis sewaya thoraganiyi. 1964 di upa polis parikshakawarayek lesa polis sewayata ekwana ohu - 1967 di thama piyage abhawayen pasu piyakuge bhumikawa chamal rajapakshayan wetha pawarini.1969 di agamathi aarakshaka sewayata ekwu chamal rajapaksha tharuna polis niladhariya - dadli senanayaka mahatha ge menma sirimawo bandaranayaka mahathmiyage – aarakshawa pilibandawa wagakima manawin itu karayi. 1972 polis sewayen iwath wu chamal rajapakshayo 1973 di rajya wanija nithigatha sansthawe samanyadhikari thanathurata pathweyi.sahodara sahodariyan ata denakugen yuth pawule loku ayiya lesa chamal rajapaksha siya jiwithaye pariwarthana yugayak kara pa thabanne wiwahaya samangaya. 1975 di haththatuwa gamage wijewardhana chandra malani menewiya samanga wiwaha diwiya arambaayi.

bangladeshaye di pawathwena thunkon ekdina krikat tharagawaliye indiyawa saha bangladesha kandayama athara palamu tharagaya ada pawathෙwi..tharagaya bangladeshaye daka nuwara di diwa rathri tharagayak lesa pawathwimata niyamithaya.mita pera pawathi tharagayen indiya kandayama shri lankawa hamuwe kadulu 5kin parajayata pathwiya.bangladesha kandayama da owun muhuna dun palamu tharagayen shri lanka kandayama hamuwe parajayata pathwima wisheshathwayaki.me wana wita lakunu satahane peramune pasuwanne shri lanka kandayamayi.

mama yakage adawiye yaka.ekama ramuwalata kotuwela hithana minissu nta prashna wala penne eka paththayi.mage lipiye udaharanayak lesa uthure prashneth aran pennuwa.balawatha saha dubalaya kiyala dennek innawa habayi aththatama balawatha kawuda dubalaya kawuda?sanwidhanathmaka pudgalaya thamayi balawath.dan me kathawe pathma anacharaye hasirila gedara awith mama anacharaye hasiruna thamayu ubata mokada kiyala piyathilakagen ahanawa.ethakota piyathilaka ayi uba ehema kale kiyala ahuwa kiyamuko.pathmata puluwan wachikawa ayawa hinsanayata lak kala kiyala nithiya idiriyata yannata 2005 gruhastha hinsana panatah yatathe.ee panatha yatathe piyathilakawa gedarin pannanawa kisiyam kalayakata.ee kalaye aniyam samiyawa gedarata ekkagena ennath padmata puluwan.methanin aarambha wena nadu katayuththa awasan wenne padmata wishala wandiyak gewanna piyathilakata siduwimen.piyathilakata yana ena man nathiwenawa.hire yannath wenna ida thibenawa.kantha sanwidhana padmata udawu karanawa .piyathilakata kath kawuruwath na.
